name: Monster Truck Jam - Expert Car Parking School Real Life Driver Sim Park In Bay Racing Games
name_original: Monster Truck Jam - Expert Car Parking School Real Life Driver Sim Park In Bay Racing Games
description:
Test Your Epic Monster Parking Skills!

Can you hold your nerve while traversing multiple ramps and other crazy obstacles to reach the parking bay? Drive your way around tons of levels at the Monster Truck Jam.

Use the precision controls and multiple camera angles for a truly immersive 3D experience.

FEATURES:

• Precision controls
• Multiple Camera Angles to Toggle
• Tons of levels
• Awesome 3D graphics

Download now 100% FREE.

#MonsterParking
